text: I’m sure this has already been said, but — Idea: repeatable fields and repeatable field groups.
It may be worth checking this out Keegan: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1523994835000037>
<@UA914H7S8> if you are not in the design manager beta, I highly recommend using it. Its got this ability and its glorious
Also, here's a little intro to repeating fields/groups: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/blog/repeating-fields-in-the-new-module-framework>
